hot.text: Jesus Christ, it’s fucking hot. Did you forget what air conditioning is?
It’s 25 degrees and you’re still not outside? Dumbass.
You’re melting like an idiot. Get inside.
Hot enough to fry your brain, moron.
You’re sweating like a damn pig in a sauna. Get a grip!
Is your brain melting too, or just your face?
Go inside before you fry yourself into a crispy snack.

cold.text: It’s freezing, dumbass. Put on a goddamn jacket.
Winter’s here to kick your ass again.
You look like a popsicle, idiot.
Cold enough to freeze your stupidity.
You look like a frozen popsicle. Defrost your dumb ass.
Put on some clothes, or you’ll catch stupid cold.
Cold enough to freeze your brain cells. No wonder you’re slow.

rainy.text: Oh look, more fucking rain. What did you do to piss off the weather gods?
Get used to looking like a drowned rat, because that’s your life now.
Umbrella? Ha! You’ll still get wet, dumbass.
Rain again? You must have pissed off the weather gods real bad.
Go get a bucket, because you’re about to drown in your own bad luck.
Umbrella won’t save you from this watery hell, genius.

perfect.text: Holy shit, a decent day? Did you win the lottery or something?
Even the weather’s tired of your bullshit and cut you some slack today.
Enjoy the rare nice weather, dumbass.
Don’t get used to it, it’s a trap.
A good day? What kind of witchcraft is this?
Enjoy this day of mercy before the world shits on you again.
Nice weather? Yeah, right. Don’t get used to it, dumbass.

cityErrors.text: Are you kidding me? That city doesn't exist, genius.
Nope, can’t find that place. Maybe try a real city?
That city? Never heard of it, and I’m the smart one here.

locationErrors.text: You blocked location? What, scared of fresh air?
You blocked location? What, scared of the outdoors?

genericErrors.text: I can’t do magic, type a real place next time.
Did you even try? Because it doesn’t look like it.
Can’t find that place, maybe check a map before you type.
